*********
Changelog
*********

This page documents the history of changes for each version of `private-pgm`.

Version X.Y.Z (Upcoming Release)
================================
* New Feature: ...
* Improvement: ...
* Bug Fix: ...

Version 0.1.0 (Initial Release) - YYYY-MM-DD
============================================
* Initial release of `private-pgm`.
* Core functionalities:
    * Dataset and Domain handling (:mod:`mbi.dataset`, :mod:`mbi.domain`).
    * Basic PGM structures (:mod:`mbi.graphical_model`, :mod:`mbi.factor`).
    * Implementation of [Mechanism A] and [Mechanism B].
    * Synthetic data generation (:mod:`mbi.synthetic_data`).
* Example scripts for toy data and Adult dataset.
* Initial test suite.

.. note::
   Keep this file updated with each new release, detailing new features,
   bug fixes, breaking changes, and other notable modifications.
   List the most recent versions at the top.
